triangle x0=0.4 y0=0.1 x1=1 y1=0.2 x2=1 y2=1
circle xc=0.8 yc=0.4 r=0.3
intersect triangle0 circle0
quit

#[{'x': 0.648031893339682, 'y': 0.141338648889947}, {'x': 0.523076923076923, 'y': 0.284615384615385}, {'x': 0.800000000000000, 'y': 0.700000000000000}, {'x': 1.00000000000000, 'y': 0.623606797749979}]
